data.name: Metal Voyager
data.detailed_description:
Features:

Original Heavy Metal Soundtrack: Blast enemies by shredding and wailing your astral guitar against a rolling backing track. Butt-loads of unique riffs and jams to destroy your enemies with during your voyage.

Hand drawn retro style: Every character and sprite is hand drawn and animated giving everything a fluid, psychedelic look.

15 Sectors: Voyage across our solar system and beyond as you soar past our celestial neighbors into the deep void.

Hard mode: Mastered the normal difficulty? Crank up the challenge with Hard mode.

Endless Mode: Complete Hard difficulty and unlock this mode to go even further into the unknown.

3 Epic Bosses: Not two! Take on the worst astral space has to offer with 3 devious bosses.

Semi randomized enemy & item spawns: Stages will throw you something different each time.

Unlock various floating pieces of detritus by racing for gold medals in Stage Select Mode!

Bonus bike stages! Easter Eggs! Achievements! Etc!!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A casual indie game from a solo developer In the spirit of game series like Geometry Wars, Metal Slug, Darius and R-Type.

data.short_description: It's your one way ticket to midnight! A side-scrolling heavy metal guitar shooter. Blast your enemies with pure metal energy from your astral guitar as the backing track rages in the night. Featuring a fleet of surreal hand drawn space monsters and an arsenal of cosmic items to whomp them with.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista SP2, Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: AMD Phenom 9750 or Pentium D 800+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 7800 GT or ATI Radeon™ HD 3000+ or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
